name: Tsu Popup
author: Freelancing Care

sections.description:
Your visitors can easily visit your Tsu profile and use it as your invitation to the network. You can optionally add a name to be displayed and choose different logo image.

Features List : (100% Free)

  • Fully Responsive Design
  • Customizable Text
  • Easy Settings & Customization
  • Easy and user-friendly setup
  • Logo Uploader
  • Icon Uploader
  • Turn On/Off options
  • Works with any WordPress Theme
  • Works with any WordPress Version
  • WordPress Multi-site Supported
  • BuddyPress Supported
  • Woo-Commerce Supported
  • Full Free Plugin
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Tsu Popup’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugins settings page

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

At first upload the zip file tsu-popup form your wrodpress admin panel. You may upload the plugin files by using FTP too.
Here have details guidelines to install a wordpress plugin

After install Tsu Popup plugin, Activate that and go to the settings page for setting your Popup.

  1. Upload `the plugin in ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now use your plugin
sections.faq:
May i use that plugin in multisite?

Yes. You can do that.

May i use that plugin in woocommerce?

Yes. You can do that.
